question: The Prime Minister has inaugurated 1.75 lakh houses built under PMAY (G) and released ‘Griha Pravesham’ plaque in which state?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi has recently inaugurated 1.75 lakh houses built under Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana - Gramin in over 12000 villages in Madhya Pradesh.
The Prime Minister also released the 'Griha Pravesham' plaque to mark the occasion. The 1.75 lakh houses are a part of the total of 18 lakh houses constructed across the country under the scheme. The work has also been completed in 35 to 40 days, instead of the usual time of 125 days.
